options.name: Scroll of Conquest
options.description: Friendly units within 6" of the bearer must reroll failed Charge Range rolls.

options.name: Regimental Colours
options.description: If the bearer's unit contains a Captain, the unit is considered to be within range of any model with Orders for the purposes of choosing a target to give an Order.

options.name: Banner of Unity
options.description: Whenever the bearer's unit is targeted by an Order, it may immediately give that same Order (for free) to up to two Support Units within 8" of the bearer's unit.

options.name: Marksman's Pennant
options.description: The bearer's unit gains Stand and Shoot.

options.name: Death Warrant
options.description: +X Att, +X Str, and +X AP, where X is the number of friendly Parent Units and Support Units of Height 1 (including the bearer's unit if applicable) Engaged in the same Combat as the wielder.

options.name: Hammer of Witches
options.description: Att is set to 5. Fury(towards Channel(X)).

options.name: Winter Cloak
options.description: The bearer gains Aegis(3+, against Flaming Attacks),Aegis(5+),Distracting(1). The wearer automatically fails all Regeneration Saves.

options.name: Locket of Sunna
options.description: When choosing Weapons and Equipment, choose one enemy Character model part in base contact with the wearer's unit. During this Round of Combat the chosen model part suffers: -2 Att, -2 Str, -2 Off, and -2 AP.

options.name: Exemplar's Flame
options.description: The bearer can cast Living Steel (Alchemy) as a Bound Spell(5+).

options.name: Mantle of Ullor
options.description: Enemy units within 8" of the wearer lose the Charging Momentum Agi bonus and +1 Combat Score from Charging.

options.name: Imperial Seal
options.description: Arm is set to 6. +1 Cou. The wearer's unit cannot voluntarily declare Flee! as a Charge Reaction.

options.name: Blacksteel
options.description:
Immune(Flaming Attacks, Lightning Attacks). +1 Arm.
If the wearer is without Mount, it gains an additional +1 Arm.

options.name: Brace of Pistols (4+) and Fire on Impact
options.parsername: Brace of Pistols (4+) andFire on Impact!
